1: Ri e u c'ojol ri David ri xebalax pa Hebron e are wa': ri nabeal, Amnon, ral ri Ahinoam, aj Jezreel; ri ucab, Daniel, ral ri Abigail, aj Carmel;
2: ri urox, Absalon, ral ri Maac, ri u mia'l ri Talmay, ajawinel re Jesur; ri ucaj, Adoniy, ral ri Haguit;
3: ri ro', Sepatiy, ral ri Abital; ri uwak, Itream, ral ri Egla, jun rixokil chic ri David.
4: We wakib u c'ojol ri David ri' xil qui wäch pa Hebron, ri xajawin wi wukub junab ruc' wakib ic'. Juwinak oxlajuj (33) junab c'ut xajawin pa Jerusalen,
5: ri xil chi wi qui wäch quiejeb u c'ojol; ri Simey, Sobab, Natan xukuje' ri Salomon, conojel wa' e ral ri Betsabe, u mia'l ri Amiel.
6: Xec'oji' chi c'u xukuje' belejeb u c'ojol: Ibar, Elisam, Elipelet,
9: Conojel wa' e u c'ojol ri David, man c'u quebajilax taj ri e u c'ojol cuc' tak ri man kas ta e rixokil. Ri Tamar are' canab.
15: Ri e u c'ojol ri Josiy e are' wa': ri nabeal, Johanan; ri ucab, Joasim; ri urox, Sedequiy; ri ucaj Salum.
16: Ri e u c'ojol ri Joasim e are' ri Jeconiy xukuje' ri Sedequiy.
17: Ri e rija'lil ri Jeconiy, ri xyut bic, e are' wa' Salatiel, nabeal u c'ojol,
18: xukuje' ri Malquiram, Pedaiy, Senazar, Jecamiy, Hosam xukuje' ri Nedabiy.
19: Ri e u c'ojol ri Pedaiy e are' wa' Zorobabel xukuje' ri Simeiy. Ri e u c'ojol ri Zorobabel e are' wa' Mesulam xukuje' ri Hananiy, xukuje' ri Selomit, canab wa',
20: e c'o chic job u c'ojol: Hasuba, Ohel, Berequiy, Hasadiy xukuje' ri Jusab-hesed.
21: Ri e u c'ojol ri Hananiy e are' wa' ri Pelatiy xukuje' ri Jesaiy. Ri e rija'lil ri Jesaiy quiterebelam tak quib, e are' wa' Repaiy, Arnan, Abdiy xukuje' ri Secaniy.
22: Ri e u c'ojol ri Secaniy e are' ri Semaiy, Hatus, Igal, Bariy, Neariy xukuje' ri Sapat e wakib chi conojel.
23: Ri e u c'ojol ri Neariy e oxib: Elioenay, Ezequiy xukuje' ri Azricam.
24: Ri e u c'ojol ri Elioenay e wukub: Hodabiy, Eliasib, Pelaiy, Acub, Johanan, Dalaiy xukuje' ri Anani.
